mapper.select: SELECT IDX, USER_IDX, BOARD_TYPE_IDX, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATED_AT, VIEWS, REF, LEV, TURN FROM BOARDS WHERE BOARD_TYPE_IDX = 1 ORDER BY IDX DESC LIMIT #{listSize} OFFSET #{cp}
SELECT IDX, USER_IDX, BOARD_TYPE_IDX, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATED_AT, VIEWS, REF, LEV, TURN FROM BOARDS WHERE BOARD_TYPE_IDX = 1 AND IDX = ${idx}

SELECT IDX, USER_IDX, BOARD_TYPE_IDX, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATED_AT, VIEWS, REF, LEV, TURN FROM BOARDS
AND TITLE LIKE '%${title}%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%${content}%'
AND BOARD_TYPE_IDX = 1
ORDER BY IDX DESC LIMIT #{listSize} OFFSET #{cp}
